title: Digital Transformation and Customer Experience in Service Retail
abstract: Mobile app adoption in retail service settings increases customer satisfaction by 0.6 points (on 5-point scale) and reduces perceived wait times by 23%. App users demonstrate 41% lower churn rates. Integration of loyalty programs with mobile platforms shows synergistic effects.
key_findings: Mobile apps increase satisfaction by 0.6 points (12%)
App users have 41% lower churn rates
Perceived wait time reduced by 23% with mobile ordering
Loyalty + mobile app combination yields 67% higher retention
